name: Kanteron Systems
overview:
European open source software company, mainly for the healthcare community, with offices and distributors worldwide.

Main products:

Kanteron Dicom station (KDS): easy-to-use, powerful, fast, secure, stable, and affordable solution for medical multimodal and multidimensional (2D, 3D, 4D, and 5D) digital image processing.

Kanteron PACS: Picture Archiving and Communication System, for medical digital images.

Augmented Reality in the Operating Room (ARSOR): a pioneering system that allows the visualization of volumetric information projected directly on the patientâ€™s body while in the operating room.

Kanteron Hospital Information System (HIS): an Information Systems developed to manage the main areas in a Hospital, assigning resources and availabilities to each, and allowing data crossing in an efficient and simple manner. An indispensable tool for efficient hospital management.

Kanteron Room Connect (KRC): a solution that satisfies all in-room connectivity requirements in a hospital: TV, Video on Demand (VoD), Radio and Music, Games, Internet (Web, Video-Conference, Instant Messaging and eMail), IP Telephony (VoIP), and Hospital Communications (communication with care-providers, food menu selection, messaging, PACS / HIS access, patient monitoring, records, medication, etc).

Kanteron Radiology Information System (RIS): an Information System that, although geared towards Radiology (RIS), it can perfectly be used in many other services (such as Cardiology, Trauma/Ortho, Oncology, etc).
